issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description: Movie included. More action button fails to activate/deactivate when s.group test3 is checked.
fields.summary: On Security groups landing page "More actions" button sometimes fails to activate in Windows7 / IE10

comments.body: I have seen the same behavior on other landing pages, like Auto Scaling groups.

I could reproduce it by adding and ssh rule with "Use my IP address" option.

After this rule was added via checkbox s.group > More actions > Manage rules  the "More actions" button would not activate on marking checkbox.
I ran into the issue again, after I launched a windows instance. More actions did not activate on the newly launched instance. Movie attached.
My mac tries to open the wmv file in textmate, which isn't right.
Hi [~dkavanagh], I tried to convert the movie, but the converted file was some kind of random mess of a movie. You can try logging in to your win 7 instance and watch it there.

I can't reproduce using the test cases mentioned, nor with other operations on various landing pages, add, delete, edit. I can always go back and select/deselect rows and the more actions works.
I've seen this behavior before, so I know there has to be some mode that triggers it. I have to shelve this and come back to it later.
Again, not able to repoduce. [~alice], were those cases you mentioned things you could do over and over to make this happen? Maybe something else is different in my test setup.
Hi [~dkavanagh], the bug is reproduced in my win 7 instance, I sent an email with the info.

I've been trying to get any debug information using that https://10.111.5.7:8888/ instance. There is nothing in the javascript console when this error happens. The developer tools to run the debugger are hanging. I'm going to spend time on the 8390 issue instead.

I can tell that when this failure mode happens, the item is being selected (at least the check box is clicked), but the listener that decides to activate (or deactivate) the "more" menu is not called. Something breaks that linkage. I can get this to happen when expanding a row. I've even had the "more" menu stick "on" till selecting a different row, then deselecting both. It seems like some rows respond properly to the click, some do not, so specific rows get broken.

I have a "fix" that I'm testing out. [~alice], please check out http://10.111.1.16:8888/
It is connected to the CLC on the same machine, which is the team dev cloud.

The change affects tabs. I removed an override to the tab render calls, in which it was attempting to do a rivets view sync. That caused an error in IE, but not on other browsers. I think there some other issues, so I'm not ready to push a branch yet.
now, I'm not happy with the "fix". It stops that error, but doesn't fix the problem, although it initially seemed to! damn IE!!
I have seen more weirdness when logged in to AWS from IE: "More actions" button does not activate, "Launch more like this" dialog not called. Probably same root cause.  Movie attached.
Workaround is to refresh the page.
